Release details, version LTS.399.1
Patch LTS.399.1 of February 19, 2024
Changes and improvements
Working with tab group when configuring the visual was stabilized.
Update package LTS.399.0 of February 13, 2024
New features
New
Communication panel
feature was added: it is designed for quick access to frequently used data with no additional switching between objects.
Start page customization was improved: now itâ€™s even easier to create your own start page!
Favorites
filter for search filters was added.
Now the
Extension
type connection can be added directly to the subject area.
New column settings and style settings for displaying registry borders and names were added.
New sendMsgToSubject functions was added: the user can now send emails to an arbitrary set of participants with a copy and a hidden copy of the email.
Edoc: the possibility to download documents with text with changes in the document comparison mode was added.
Changes and improvements
Working with settings for displaying analytical panel height in dashboards was improved;
Display of columns in registries was improved;
Working with business processes was improved: Signal Start Event function was stabilized;
SetAttr function was stabilized;
Search filters functioning was optimized;
Possibility of highlighting attributes under different visuals was improved;
Now for "Numeric" and "Integer" attributes there is no formatting with value separation (no space or comma);
Attribute permissions granting when checking a field for an empty value was stabilized;
Attribute names display was stabilized;
Working with guf files when installing updates was stabilized.
